alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 2:03PM MDT until May 29 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Meade County in west central South Dakota... Central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 203 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southwest of Black Hawk, or 6 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Black Hawk around 210 PM MDT. Rapid City around 220 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Rapid City Airport and Caputa. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 52 and 74. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
